title: Verify change is only impacting files<16MB when "download-andthen-dispatch" enabled
custom_steps:
Enable tenant feature flag "download-andthen-dispatch"
Configure a dlp based policy for an app
Upload/download a file which hits above policy file-size: 12MB
custom_expected:
Verify dlp based policy is hit
Verify file gets uploaded/downloaded
Verify md5sum of the file is same
Verify no error log on proxy, dlpsvc
Verify no crash on proxy and dlp
Verify request gets queued up on proxy first before streaming to dlpsvc
